stimulusHtml: Matcha green tea is primarily cultivated by Japanese farmers. Suppose that Matcha green tea grows in popularity as its health benefits, namely its lower caffeine content, become known, and at the same time the government reduces taxes imposed on Japanese tea farmers. What is the likely effect on the equilibrium price and equilibrium quantity in the Japanese Matcha tea market?
choicesHtml: The equilibrium price will increase, and the equilibrium quantity will increase.
The equilibrium price will decrease, and the equilibrium quantity will decrease.
The equilibrium price will be indeterminate, and the equilibrium quantity will increase.
The equilibrium price will be indeterminate, and the equilibrium quantity will decrease.
The equilibrium price will decrease, and the equilibrium quantity will be indeterminate.
